programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Wild West Chronicles - Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2: Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town's beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the slow wheel of justice?

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - End of the Trail: The three remaining cowboys go head-to-head in a dramatic final showdown to prove they have more heart, grit, and cowboy skills than their fellow competitors. In the arena, the cowboys are tested individually on roping and reining. The extremely technical challenge puts the contestants on edge. An impressive performance by one of the competitors sets the bar high for the rest of the cowboys. Out in the field, the contestants have to work together as a team in their last challenge. The cowboys must successfully drive a herd through a grueling three-mile journey of pastures and pines, navigating multiple obstacles throughout the way. Feeling the pressure to win, bad communication puts the herd in a dangerous situation when a group of their cattle wanders onto a busy road. Trace spends one-on-one time with the remaining cowboys, evaluates their performances throughout the competition, and names the first-ever winner of the Ultimate Cowboy Showdown.

programme.title: Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The Cowboy Way - Crazy Rich Texans: The cowboys are deep in the heart of Texas! In this episode of The Cowboy Way, the guys try to cash in on a cattle bounty roundup: hard cash for each cow they catch. But this money ain't easy thanks to a sprawling 500-acre ranch covered in mesquite brush with razor-sharp thorns. Just when the cowboys think they've found a promising Texas cattle connection, Booger makes a big mistake that could jeopardize their first meeting with a hard-nosed rancher. Back in Alabama, Bubba and Kaley's house guest is beginning to overstay his welcome. As they try to teach Andrew the Thompson house rules, he commits the biggest cowboy sin of all — messing with Bubba's grill! Booger, Jaclyn, and Matthew care for a new-born calf. Misty has a special surprise for Cody. An offer to travel back to Texas for another cattle drive doesn't thrill the cowboys, but they begin to consider the networking potential and how it might make their cattle-trading dreams come true.

programme.title: Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The Cowboy Way - Cash Cows: First, the cowboys need to track down one of Bubba's most troublesome heifers before she can bust through his fence again. After briefly tending to business and family in Alabama, the guys head back to the Lone Star State to try and expand their network of contacts. Bubba, Cody, and Booger help their new friend Cash with a big Texas cattle drive in the hopes of both leading the herd to greener pastures and finding the big cattle deal they came west for. On the range they forge deeper bonds with their Texas counterparts, swapping cowboy stories around the campfire. But things take a turn for the worse when the herd overheats, and the creek they're all counting on has run dry as a bone. Back home, Jaclyn and Matthew are learning to love life on the ranch. Houseguest Andrew's disgusting habits have Kaley seeing red. And just as Misty gets back in the barrel-racing saddle, she starts to butt heads with her high-strung mare.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - Showdown at the Arena: Only seven cowboys remain, eager for the chance to prove they can win it all. The immunity challenge examines each cowboy's patience and control in a point system challenge. The contestant with the highest score won't have to sweat the next elimination round. When it looks like it might come down to a tie, the last cowboy to ride prevails. In the two-part elimination challenge, the contestants must gather and load a herd into a trailer before racing off to a neighboring field where they must doctor a few yearlings in open pasture. The green team starts strong, but a few wrong moves have major repercussions. On the blue team, a cowboy takes the lead, curious to see if his teammate will sink or swim under pressure. The elimination comes down to two rivals who don't hold back when it comes to letting Trace know why the other should go home. In the end, Trace sends the cowboy whose heart doesn't seem to be in it to win it, but they don't go quietly.

programme.title: State Plate
programme.desc: State Plate - Hawaii: Host Taylor Hicks explores tropical Hawaii searching for the spirit of aloha and the perfect State Plate. On Waikiki Beach, he samples musubi, “the surfer's energy bar,” made of seaweed, rice and an unexpected food beloved in the region: Spam®. Taylor then travels inland to learn about kalua pig, a succulent main course that's slow cooked over local volcanic rock. He harvests the official state plant, taro, to help create poi, a traditional island side dish. For his second side, Taylor picks what is known as the world's sweetest pineapple, Meli Kalima (“honey cream”). Finally, he chooses coconut from “the tree of life” to use as the main ingredient of the creamy dessert called haupia. Get ready to say “mahalo” for authentic island cuisine!

programme.title: State Plate
programme.desc: State Plate - South Carolina: Taylor heads to South Carolina to experience its charm, hospitality and legendary cuisine. In Charleston, he learns to make she crab soup with a recipe that includes locally sourced blue crab, cream and the roe that puts “she” into “she crab.” For the entrée, Taylor ventures below sea level for a Lowcountry Boil with potatoes, kielbasa sausage, bi-color corn and white shrimp. He then harvests collard greens—the official state vegetable—and boils them with pork to make a sweet-yet-savory side dish. Next, he visits America's largest tea plantation to taste sweet tea, the “table wine of the South.” Finally, he travels to Mount Pleasant to watch the creation of the perfect dessert: legendary Benne Wafers. It's a heaping helping of Southern tradition on State Plate!

programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Now closer to his ex-wife and daughter, he's ready to settle down and embrace a life without chaos. But trouble has a way of following him. Just when he starts getting adjusted to the simple life, a murder in the community puts the residents on edge and refuels a longtime feud between two of the most powerful families. As Justin and his deputies work the case, he realizes there is more to his new home than meets the eye. Secrets unfold, and motives emerge, leading Justin on a race against time to solve the case before the townspeople take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Local Knowledge

programme.title: Local Knowledge

programme.desc: We uncover true Greek noshing in Montreal's Parc Ex district with a trip to a Greek fish market, a Greek baker and a Greek rotisserie for an entire lamb cooked on the spit.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: Chefs and co-hosts Jasmin Ibrahim and Shahir Massoud get saucy with their spice recipes.

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: Chefs and co-hosts Jasmin Ibrahim and Shahir Massoud get to the root of spicing up food as they cook dishes using spice roots.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Mary Tang cooks up traditional Cantonese dim sum recipes that are big on flavor.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Lisa Nguyen makes irresistible Vietnamese dishes with French influences, including a melt-in-your-mouth Mango Crème Caramel.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: South African-born Shameen learns about her heritage, which includes traces of Filipino roots, and chef Mila shows her Filipino cooking techniques and tools to create her own meal.

programme.title: American Casseroles
programme.desc: Macaroni and cheese and turkey Tetrazzini are two classic casseroles, but they are rarely as good as they could be. We knew we could do better-much better-in the test kitchen.

programme.title: Maple-Glazed Pork Roast
programme.desc: Pork producers have worked so hard to remove fat from their pigs that most pork roasts have little character. Glazing a pork roast with maple syrup is an attractive way to boost flavor, but all too often the meat becomes sweet and candylike. We wanted to perfect this recipe.

programme.title: Steak and Potatoes
programme.desc: Purchase a good steak and cook it properly, and all it needs is salt and pepper-and, of course, a side of spuds. Unfortunately, many of the inexpensive steaks labeled "great for grilling'' at the supermarket turn out tough and dry with little flavor. And mashed potatoes are often gluey or runny. We wanted potatoes with perfect texture and big flavor-something unusual to accompany a great steak and a good bottle of wine.

programme.title: More Italian Classics
programme.desc: Pasta all'amatriciana is perhaps Rome's most famous dish. Despite the fancy name, it's nothing more than long-strand pasta sauced with tomatoes, onion, bacon, and hot pepper flakes and dusted with cheese. This simple dish is about the details, and we knew they could be mastered.

programme.title: Old-Fashioned Birthday Cake
programme.desc: In this episode, we've developed a layer cake with an old-fashioned jam filling and real butter frosting.

programme.title: High-Roast Chicken Dinner
programme.desc: There are certain dinners we rely on again and again. Take roast chicken and potatoes. It's simple, yet satisfying. We are particularly fond of roasting the chicken and potatoes together in one pan. While the chicken roasts, its juices drip onto the potatoes, giving them a wonderfully rich crust and creamy flavor.

programme.title: Best Beef Stew
programme.desc: Beef, beer, and onions have a natural affinity-it's one reason burgers and onion rings are on the menu at nearly every sports bar. In a carbonnade, the heartiness of beef melds with the soft sweetness of sliced onions in a lightly thickened broth that is rich, deep, and satisfying. We aimed to create the very best version of this cold-weather favorite.

programme.title: Lighter Cheesecake
programme.desc: We wanted to come up with recipes for two classic desserts, carrot cake and cheesecake that are a bit lighter.

programme.title: The Perfect Cake
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia make the perfect Gingerbread Layer Cake and Keith Makes Sticky Toffee Pudding Cakes.

programme.title: The Perfect Cookie
programme.desc: Test cook Dan Souza makes Julia a festive recipe for Easy Holiday Sugar Cookies. Equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for parchment paper, and gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews silicone baking mats. Test cook Lan Lam then makes Bridget the Best Lemon Bars.

programme.title: Elegant Dinner Party
programme.desc: In this episode, Bridget and Julia uncover the secrets to the ultimate Braised Brisket with Pomegranate, Cumin, and Cilantro. In the Equipment Corner, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews his top pick for twist corkscrews. Finally, test cook Dan Souza makes a decadent Duchess Potato Casserole.

programme.title: Pub-Style Favorites, Revisited
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster uncover the secrets to making the ultimate Pub-Style Steak and Ale Pie at home. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for knife blocks. Finally, test cook Keith Dresser makes Bridget perfect Boston Brown Bread.

programme.title: Soup for Dinner
programme.desc: Test cook Dan Souza and host Julia Collin Davison make Chicken Bouillabaisse, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of cinnamon, and then Julia and Bridget uncover the secrets to Avgolemono.

programme.desc: Jamie shows how to make Asian-style salmon, noodle broth, beansprout salad and lychee desert.

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip
programme.desc: Jamie finds himself in unknown territory during the harsh Arizona Winter.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie heads to glorious Puglia to seek out family recipes.

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen
programme.desc: In this first part episode influenced by The Feast of The Seven Fishes, Chef Nick Stellino shares memorable stories about his father, Vinny, and his traditions of fishing and cooking fresh from the ocean seafood dishes. Dishes include: Tuna Sashimi "Sicilian Style" / Shrimp with Pepper and Wine Sauce / Pan Fried Cod with Tomato Concasse / Pan Fried Scallops with Peas and Bacon Cream Sauce.

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen
programme.sub-title: He Still Speaks With The Fishes
programme.desc: Chef Nick Stellino concludes his two-part episode inspired by the Feast of The Seven Fishes with more musings of his father Vinny and his culinary envisions to bring the soul of the fish to a plate. Dishes include: Tuna Tartare "Sicilian Style" / Clams with Tomatoes Wine and Garlic / Calamari with Sun Dried Tomatoes.

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Nick Stellino tells us the story about how annual road trips to visit his grandmother in Northern Italy created an obsession for a particular dish, Roasted Turkey. Dishes include: Roasted Turkey Breast / Turkey Gravy / Green Beans with Almond and Mint / Pan Fried Roasted Potatoes with Sage and Garlic / Cranberry Sauce.

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Nick Stellino talks about his love for Jazz music and some of his favorite musicians that inspired him to find a connection between writing songs and cooking recipes in the kitchen. Dishes include: Pork Chops with Fagioli al Ucelleto / Pasta with Pesto / Poached Apples with Prosecco.

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: In Italy, a great risotto always brings a smile. Here, we all smile as Lidia prepares Risotto Milanese, a simple risotto with saffron broth, finished with butter and Parmigiano Reggiano, and Suppli di Telefono, risotto rolled into balls filled with prosciutto and mozzarella, then crisply fried. When split, the mozzarella pulls apart like telephone wires, thus the name.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia prepares Frico, a specialty of her native Friuli. Frico is a pancake made by sauteing Montasio cheese in a skillet until golden brown. Lidia shows us the basic dish, and then a creative surprise. Next, it's Chicken under brick: a split chicken seared (under the weight of a brick, or heavy skillet) on the stove top until crisp-skinned, golden brown, and served immediately.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia Matticchio Bastianich cooks a universal favorite, marinated lamb chops, served with a memorable sauce, prepared with fresh mint leaves, wine, stock, citrus juices and herbs. The lamb is served with scaffata -- spring legumes simmered slowly – along with crispy, golden roasted potato wedges.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia Matticchio Bastianich orchestrates a dramatic pair of aromatic herb-seasoned whole veal shanks. This is one of those long, slow cooked dishes that you don't have to stand over to make, but rather visit as flavors and aromas of lamb, Barolo wine, tomatoes and onions, porcini mushrooms, bacon, oranges and cloves, all merge in perfect harmony. Lidia plays Toscanini of the cuccina.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Strozzapretti, literally, means “priest choker.” These ricotta dumpling are so good that in the vein of “I'll bet you can't eat just one,” the fabled priest, visiting for dinner, could not limit his intake of these little marvels. Here Lidia shares how it's made: ricotta gnocchi with radicchio trevisano sauce. To complete the meal, a zesty “Italian style” ricotta cheese cake.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Two very sensual dishes. For Chicken Valdostana, Lidia layers chicken breast with prosciutto, tomato, and herbs, sautéed in wine and butter, adds fontina cheese, and bakes until the cheese melts, becomes golden brown. Then, Seared Pork Cutlets and peppers in a fresh marinara served over rigatoni provides an equally appealing choice. Fortunately, we get both in this episode!

programme.title: MIX
programme.desc: Tamee heads to LA's China Town to serve up apothecary style cocktails at “GENERAL LEE'S”. This historic bar was originally founded in 1868. Then it's off to Van Nuys CA for some beer, darts & bagpipes at the craft brewery “MACLEOD ALE BREWING COMPANY”.

programme.title: MIX
programme.desc: In this Food & Drink Edition of MIX, Tamee goes behind the bar and heads back to the kitchen of West Hollywood's CHURCH KEY. She mixes cocktails with rock star mixologist Rob Floyd & cooks up some incredible dishes with acclaimed chef Ryan Ososky

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Italians are not big beef eaters. When they do indulge, it is rarely with steak…except in Florence, where Bistecca Fiorentina is a favorite. At 2” thick, grilled over coals, with a very special anchovy, rosemary and salt rub, it is served with braised cannellini beans. Caramelized tomatoes (yes!) over vanilla ice cream for dessert it's a rich and robust dessert after Bistecca!

programme.title: For the Love of Bread
programme.desc: Malta is known for its sun, sea and simple way of life. Andrew learns the history of wood-fired sourdough and pastizi, a go-to snack for the Maltese people. With one of the longest recorded history with bread, which is a sourdough, bread is engrained in their rich history.

programme.title: For the Love of Bread
programme.desc: London's diverse population and food influences makes it one of the world's leading cultural hubs at the forefront of food, arts, music and culture. Andrew meets some amazing artisan and bakers who are putting sourdough and sustainability on the map.

programme.title: The Pizza City You've Never Heard Of
programme.desc: Disturbed by the fact that his hometown of Windsor, Ontario is typically overlooked on lists of the top pizza cities in the world, George Kalivas goes on a mission to set the record straight about where to find the best pies on the planet.

programme.title: From Scratch
programme.desc: David goes to the original capital of pizza in Naples, Italy, where he learns from the masters. David will harvest the wheat for dough, make fresh mozzarella, go night fishing and finally harvest the basil and tomatoes with local farmers.

programme.title: From Scratch
programme.desc: Arriving in Malta, David planned to make a meal with Chef Stefan Hogan of Corinthia Palace, but as he had to scramble to find ingredients, the meal soon became whatever he could harvest locally.

programme.title: From Scratch
programme.desc: David works with Michelin star chef, Christiano Andreini, to recreate his coastal Sardinian dishes. David learns diving for octopus in open, rough waters is no easy feat, and must quickly find an alternative.

programme.title: Bear Grylls' Biggest Adventures in Britain
programme.desc: Bear goes to North Wales, and the glorious mountains of Snowdonia, a landscape shaped by volcanic eruptions and shattering continental fractures. Bear starts his adventure by crossing Cardigan Bay, which at 50-miles wide is the largest bay in Wales.

programme.title: Bear Grylls' Biggest Adventures in Britain
programme.desc: Adventurer Bear Grylls explores British adventures and the country's extreme landscapes. In episode two, Bear reveals the tropical past of the Yorkshire Dales while abseiling at Malham Cove.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Great Escape
programme.desc: In tonight's first programme, Gordon's odyssey begins in the north, home of our curry house classics. On board an express train he's thrown in at the deep end and experiences a back-to-basics baptism of fire, cooking for its many passengers in the train's cramped pantry car and getting travel sick while he's making curry. In stark contrast he then meets his match working for a cantankerous royal chef, preparing a biryani with a difference for a huge wedding feast before venturing into the jungle where he gets eaten alive by ants when he scales a 40-foot tree in search of the local tribe's favourite delicacy. Then it's on to Delhi to cook at the restaurant that invented tandoori chicken, where Gordon puts into practice everything he's learnt for a tough crowd of Delhi food critics.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Great Escape
programme.desc: In tonight's second programme Gordon's got a taste for adventure and heads off the tourist track into impenetrable north-east India, home of the country's best-kept culinary secrets. Leaving the 21st century behind, he immerses himself in the life of a local meat-loving tribe in Nagaland, once better known for head-hunting than their curries. Then he's off to Assam to enter a housewives' competition to find the best Assamese dish and finally he sets up shop among the street food stalls of Calcutta to try and tempt the local foodies into buying north-east curry – Ramsay style.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Great Escape
programme.desc: In tonight's final programme Gordon heads south to the coasts of Kerala for the ultimate seafood curry. In Tamil Nadu he hits a meat-free zone and faces his biggest culinary nightmare, living in an ashram where the only food on the menu is vegetarian. Any tranquillity soon evaporates when Gordon tries his highest-octane sport yet - bullock racing - before his final stop in the slums of Mumbai. There he cooks on Slumdog Millionaire streets before putting himself to the ultimate test, cooking alongside one of India's top chefs for a star-studded dinner at the Taj Hotel.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Starting Up Starting Over
programme.desc: In 2016, newlyweds Jade and Alice (aged 34 and 26 at the time) decide to turn their backs on successful careers in London to relocate 500 miles north to the stunning Scottish Highlands. They plough the proceeds from selling their flat in Croydon and all their savings into buying and restoring a 200 year old rundown and remote small hotel, in order to start new lives being their own boss as hoteliers and restaurateurs.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Starting Up Starting Over
programme.desc: Ben Fogle travels to the small town of Ulverston in the beautiful Cumbrian countryside beside the Lake District to meet Kat and Gwill and explore their dream of owning and running their own café-restaurant. Kat left a high-powered legal career in the City of London, trading her flat by the Thames for a 300 year old warehouse in Ulverston which she wants to convert into a café-pizzeria.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Starting Up Starting Over
programme.desc: Ben Fogle travels to John O'Groats, the most northerly point of mainland Britain, to meet former nanny Cara. She's left her life and career in London and followed her childhood dream of owning her own small farm.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Starting Up Starting Over
programme.desc: Ben Fogle travels to the Malvern Hills area of Worcestershire to meet Hani and Sarah and explore their dream of owning and running their own beer brewery.

programme.title: Junk Raiders
programme.desc: It's going to be a busy week for the team as they are faced with a mountain of work to do and less than a month left to get the whole clubhouse built. Their biggest challenge right now: Finding enough structural steel to build the two-story clubhouse to satisfy the architect's demanding design. So far the team hasn't been able to find a single free piece of structural steel, and unless their luck changes fast the whole project will be a wash.

programme.title: Junk Raiders
programme.desc: There's less than three weeks left until opening day for the Junk Raiders Clubhouse and the team is behind the eight ball trying to get a handle on the enormous amount of projects that still lay ahead for them. Top of mind are finding the 80 stainless steel sinks that the team still needs for the architect's wacky sink wall. So far they've struck out. And unless a small miracle happens the wall will be a bust. That goes for many of the other projects the team is struggling with at this point as well. Things have been taking too long, and costing too much, at this point both time and money are in serious short supply.

programme.title: Building the Dream
programme.desc: In stunning rural Suffolk, laid back Steve and Susan's hit-and-hope construction of an oak-framed cottage urgently needs a pep talk from Charlie to get the project out of trouble and back in line

programme.title: Building the Dream

programme.title: All for Nothing?
programme.desc: Jeff and Joanne tackle their kitchen reno with gusto resulting in a risky expense tally. Joel and Jill keep their expenses low but jeopardize their chances of finishing on time with their slow pace.

programme.title: All for Nothing?

programme.desc: Wendy put off her wedding until her son had fully recovered from life-threatening cancer. Now her grateful son wants the Make-A-Wish Foundation(R) to bring David Tutera to Topeka, Kansas and throw his mom the wedding of her dreams.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding
programme.desc: Bride Kristina wants a Goth wedding complete with spiders, skulls and even an all-black wedding dress! David Tutera wants to lighten up the festivities, but first he'll have to convince the bride to try on a little wedding white.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding
programme.desc: David Tutera's newest bride is so clothes-crazy that she spent most of her budget on a designer dress and shoes, leaving the rest of her wedding behind. Now David has to transform this fashionista bride's festivities in a hurry.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding
programme.desc: David Tutera meets a bride who wants a romantic Tuscan-style wedding. Trouble is, her mom is taking over, everyone just lost their jobs, and her bridesmaids' dresses are a disaster. Can David rescue her Tuscan dream wedding?

programme.title: Braxton Family Values
programme.desc: Tamar gets first ultrasound. Traci's excited to surprise family with her motorcycle skills. Evelyn holds memorial service for her dog and announces move to LA. Trina fights back when son gets bullied at school.

programme.title: Braxton Family Values
programme.desc: Toni asks Trina to perform her songs at a concert. Trina is excited to debut her new single but shows up unprepared Toni considers cutting the song. Evelyn moves to LA and makes Tamar take a parenting class.

programme.title: Braxton Family Values
programme.desc: Trina finally gets to perform her new single

programme.title: Braxton Family Values
programme.desc: Toni hosts a screening for her first lead in a movie. While Tamar deals with pregnancy woes, Evelyn nervously goes on blind dates. Trina's ready to open a sisters' store without Gabe, but there's more debate.

programme.title: Braxton Family Values
programme.desc: Toni decides if she wants to record again with Babyface. Tamar storms out of her shower after Toni makes a big announcement. The sisters are worried by Traci's bizarre behavior and uncover shocking news.

programme.title: Braxton Family Values
programme.desc: Traci faces questions from her fans and family about rumors that her husband has a possible love child. Trina and Gabe discuss divorce. Toni works on a new song with Babyface. Tamar promotes her album release.

programme.title: Braxton Family Values
programme.desc: Traci questions her husband about his possible illegitimate son and confronts her sisters about revealing the rumor on television. Toni & Tamar prepare for their tours Trina gets back in the studio Tamar makes a big apology.

programme.title: Braxton Family Values
programme.desc: Toni preps to go on her first tour in five years and challenges Trina and Towanda during rehearsals. Tamar struggles through sickness as she rehearses for her upcoming tour. Traci gets her own radio show.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The ten remaining chefs must make tapas from leftovers. At the dinner service, one chef's mistake nearly derails both teams.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay challenges the teams' palates in a blind taste test. In a packed dinner service, anxiety is higher than usual when celebrities Eric McCormack and Robert Patrick stop by.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The remaining chefs must prepare a dish made with king crab, with each team presenting its strongest plate to Chef Ramsay. During dinner service, the teams devise their own menus.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay dissolves the teams. Now the six remaining chefs are on their own as they each prepare a dish using fourteen simple ingredients.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: After a trip to Atlantic City's Borgata, where the winner will soon be a top chef, the contestants must prepare a signature dish that they would serve at the esteemed hotel.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay cooks for the remaining four chefs, then tells them to replicate what he had prepared. Later, there's a surprise proposal planned for the dessert course.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The final three contestants must prepare a meal for 100 of L.A.'s finest chefs. The winner gets a TV talk show appearance, while the losers must wash and iron the linens.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay suggests a few top-down changes to help Mangia Mangia survive.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: To see if they've heeded his advice, Chef Ramsay checks up on La Galleria, the Olde Hitching Post and Prohibition Grille.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay returns to Scottsdale to visit Amy's Baking Company. We see an interview with the owners, previously unseen footage and initial reactions to Gordon's first visit.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay treks to Boston to visit La Galleria 33, an Italian restaurant managed by sisters. Ramsay must improve their bland menu and fix a dire financial situation.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Continuing his work at La Galleria 33, Chef Ramsay helps management deal with staffing issues, menu improvements and décor renovation.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay drops by Mama Maria's, a pizzeria in Brooklyn with an exhausted owner and an unmanageable staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay tries to improve a Pittsburgh eatery plagued by negative customer feedback and a squabbling staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay stops by Barefoot Bob's, a beachfront restaurant in Massachusetts that's owned by a couple whose marriage is fraying.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Tensions run high as designers are pushed to the limit to create avant-garde fashion inspired by contemporary art. Style icon Boy George guests.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Four surprise guests return to advise the All Stars as they create print-on-print looks for Nina Garcia. A shock challenge on the runway has two designers battling to make the finale.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Atop the new World Trade Center, the All Stars are challenged to create collections inspired by NYC. Debra Messing joins the judges to crown the winner. Season finale.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: 8 All Star Rookies and 8 returning All Star Veterans battle to create cohesive collections in the biggest season in All Stars' history. Season premiere.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Designers tear, dye and burn to create distressed fashion for a post-apocalyptic runway. Danielle Brooks guests.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Designers pair up to create fashion inspired by food & wine pairings. Whoopi Goldberg joins the judges for All Stars' first ever double elimination.

programme.title: Project Runway

programme.title: Project Runway

programme.title: Adult Film Star
programme.desc: First, Lou, Froy, and Matt press charges after a violent debtor attacks the crew. Later, Lou, Sonia, and Froy head out to the boondocks to repo a BMW in the middle of an adult film shoot. And finally, Sonia and Lyndah ride out in Sonia's car to meet up with the debtor's sister-in-law who helps the team find the debtor's car.

programme.title: Wrench in the Works
programme.desc: First, a wrench is thrown in the works, and at the car, when Froy and Matt try to repo from a plumber. Then, the duo go out again to try to repo a car from a slap-happy debtor, but unfortunately the car has a boot on it. And finally, Froy, Matt, Lyndah, and Sonia head out to the ranch to repo a tractor from some pushy ranch hands.

programme.title: Bouquets and Blowtorches
programme.desc: The team returns from a successful mission in Vegas, but there's trouble brewing within the crew's ranks. Ronnie and Carlos repo from a self-defense instructor who lets his students do his dirty work, Matt and Froy confront a delinquent delivery man steeling flowers from graves, and Lou and Carlos are left defenseless against gang members with blowtorches. Can Lou still keep his cool in the high pressure repo business, or will there be repercussions for Matt and Froy that no one saw coming?

programme.title: It's Not Funny
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a comedian's preparations for a show to repossess his Dodge, but not if his girlfriend has anything to say about it. Then, Lyndah & Sonia respond to a tip and sabotage a paparazzo's big shot by hooking his car. And finally, Lou and Matt have to take a van from an amateur marching band with a terrible secret.

programme.title: Hayseed Inferno
programme.desc: Sonia pushes the company to repossess more than just cars, and the backlash from the team threatens to end her time in charge before it's even begun.? Ronnie and Matt attempt to repo from a reckless motocross daredevil.

programme.title: It Ain't No Joke!
programme.desc: In this kick-off to the final season, the cast takes viewers back through the most outrageous, comical, and memorable repos of the series. And, get a sneak peek of the final season of Operation Repo.

programme.title: Who Wants Ice Cream?
programme.desc: First, Sonia, Matt, Froy, and Lou roll up and roll on a gang of brothers to gain possession of an Infinity. Next, Matt and Froy stand in the way of a drugged debtor keeping his car. And finally, it's time for some ice cream for Lou, Froy, and Sonia when they head out to repo an ice cream truck.

programme.title: We Have to Dispose of It
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off with a catering van filled with food. And finally, Froy, Lyndah, and Matt wind up in the middle of a gang dispute when they try to repo a tricked out lowrider on the outskirts of town.

programme.title: Now Serving Mrs. Pizarro
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy discuss what they will do with their severance pay once the company is sold, but have to put discussion on hold while they repo repo a hovercraft golf cart from a snooty golfer. Next, Sonia and Ronnie's easy day at the salon gets disastrous when the should-be debtor serves Sonia with a lawsuit. And finally, Froy and Carlos head out to a worksite to repo the bulldozer that Carlos should have been training for.

programme.title: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy transform their search for a small dirt bike into a quasi-reality show, getting a group of young smart-asses trapped into their own web. Then, Sonia and Matt head to the business district for a different sort of quarry - a high-end luxury tanning bed owned by a less-than-sympathetic German. And finally, Lou and Matt set up a high stakes sting operation to bust a shady tow-truck driver, but will their best-laid plans go up in smoke?

programme.title: Four Wheel Surprise
programme.desc: First, Lou and Matt confront a big-time player and his bodyguards at a Brazilian restaurant. Then, Sonia and Lyndah head to a yard sale to get a vehicle away from the car's owner and her out-of-control friend. And finally, the whole team hits the beach in an effort to get a truck-load of ATV's away from a gang of knife-wielding beach bums.

programme.title: Hayseed Inferno
programme.desc: Sonia pushes the company to repossess more than just cars, and the backlash from the team threatens to end her time in charge before it's even begun.? Ronnie and Matt attempt to repo from a reckless motocross daredevil.

programme.title: Interview with the Repo Man
programme.desc: The repo team confronts the toughest challenge yet: one-on-one interviews with an anger management specialist. Lyndah and Froy head to the Hollywood Hills to find a luxury sedan.

programme.title: Angry Swarms
programme.desc: Matt, Lou, and Lyndah try to repo a car from a man who is not afraid to throw some punches. Then, Matt and Lou face a dilemma when they realize their target vehicle is filled with angry bees. And, Sonia and Froy hit the airwaves to reclaim a truck that's being used in a radio broadcast stunt.

programme.title: Hard Turns Ahead
programme.desc: Armed with the belief that he is now co-owner of the business, Matt starts making some big business calls - is this the beginning of a new chapter for the team, or the beginning of its undoing?

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Andy recently appeared on Conan on TBS. Around that same time, his half-hour special premiered on Comedy Central. He was the first comedian to make his network television debut on “The Tonight Show starring Jimmy Fallon”. He also appeared on Comics Unleashed with Byron Allen, and Gotham Comedy Live on AXS. He had also appeared on Comedy Central's “Live at Gotham” in 2009.

programme.title: Key Lewis
programme.sub-title: Half Black, Half White, Looks Mexican
programme.desc: Sacramento California born Key Lewis is a high energy, improvisational, storytelling, multiple-personality nutcase! His love for the people and hunger for the stage is his undying motivation. His comedic stories about his interracial childhood, family, and unusual views on relationships, make Key simply a joy to watch. His ability to improvise and interact with all types of crowds makes this up and coming comic and actor one to look out for. Key Lewis has appeared on Marlon Wayans TBSís Funniest Wins, Starz Networks StaannDup, Kevin Harts One Mic Stand as well as Bill Bellamyís Whoís Got Jokes! Key says, chase your dream, always know your audience donít act funny, be funny... donít worry about the quantity of your material but the quality the sooner you create a relationship with your crowd, the better you will be. Television: Bill Bellamyís Whoís Got Jokes on TVONE. BETíS One Mic Stand Hosted by Kevin Hart. Starz Network Comedy Series called StaannDup, Marlon Wayanís TBSís Funniest Wins! Competitions: Winner of the 2013 Rocky Mountain Laugh Off, Finalist in the 2010 Bay Area Black Comedy Competition, Semi-Finalist 2009 San Francisco International Comedy Competition, a Semi-Finalist in the 2008 Boston Comedy Festival, 2007 Seattle International Comedy Competition Finalist, Shades of Laughs Portland Oregon Winner, TVONE Bill Bellamyís Who Got Jokeís Contestant. Radio: Improv work with FM Morning Shows (Top 40 Radio): KSFM 102.5 (Sacramento, CA), KWOD 106.5 (Sacramento, CA) KWIN 97.7 ñ Stockton/Lodi, CA, Mix 107.9 Salt Lake City UT (Is It Racist Segment) & The Man Panel. Concerts/Festivals: Opened for Jon B. and Keysha Cole, Taste Of Tacoma, & Bite Of Seattle Fountain Stage 5 Years Running! Key Lewis has worked with the likes of Kevin Hart, Pablo Francisco, Sam Bam, Alonzo Bodden, Jay London, Gabriel Iglesias, Brooks McBeth, Tommy Davidson, Katt Williams, De-Ray Davis, Andrew Norelli, Lonnie Love, Jeff Garcia, Damon Wayans, Joey Diaz, Guy Torry, Darren Carter, Paul Mooney, Kermet Apio and many more.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.sub-title: Chris Schlichting: Catch and Dress a Squirrel
programme.desc: Chris Schlichting, an Iowan with every bone in his body still intact, comes with a few crucial warnings. Beware of birthday wishes, day raccoons, and the spelling on all hand written love letters.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: JJ Barrows was raised in South Carolina as the middle child of a preacher's family. Having always felt a little different, JJ uses humor to navigate through the realities of life.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Tom Foss has traveled around the world entertaining our troops. Including 5 tours to Iraq, 6 tours of Afghanistan, 11 tours of the middle east, 4 tours of Europe, 3 tours of the Far East, Greenland, 5 aircraft carriers, support ships and bases all around the United States. While not on tour overseas Foss keeps his foot on the ground as a regular at the Improvs, Funnybones and the world famous Hollywood Comedy Store.

programme.title: Mike Siegel
programme.desc: Mike Siegel is a stand-up comedian, TV host, and actor. For nine years, he hosted TBS network's TBS Movie EXTRA and has hosted numerous other network shows including HGTV's If Walls Could Talk and What You Get For the Money, GSN Live on the Game Show Network, and The Next GAC Star on GAC. Along with numerous appearances as a panelist on E! network's hit show Chelsea Lately, Mike has performed stand-up comedy on many television shows, including Last Comic Standing (NBC), The Late Late Show (CBS), Late Friday (NBC), Comedy Showcase with Louie Anderson (NBC), Stand-up, Stand-up (Comedy Central), and Friday Night (NBC). Mike's also been seen on the small screen as an actor. He was a recurring guest star on the CBS drama JAG, and had supporting roles in Mike and Molly (CBS), Rules of Engagement (ABC), 24 (FOX), Prison Break (FOX), Better Off Ted (ABC), Less Than Perfect (ABC), Eve (UPN), Strong Medicine (Lifetime), Andy Richter Controls the Universe (FOX), and Sabrina (WB).

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Mike Guido has made his mark as a nationally known headlining comedian. He has made eight national TV appearances including SHOWTIME, A&E, MTV, and VH1 and has worked with some of today's biggest stars such as Jay Leno, Robin Williams, and Ellen Degenneres.

programme.title: Kellen Erskine
programme.desc: Kellen Erskine was featured on season 7 of NBC's America's Got Talent. His jokes have appeared in many publications including the Reader's Digest. Kellen has been a finalist of both the San Francisco International Comedy Competition and the Great American Comedy Festival. This year he performed at the prestigious Bridgetown Comedy Festival in Portland, Oregon. Kellen opens regularly for Frank Caliendo of FOX's NFL Sunday.

programme.title: Yakov Smirnoff
programme.sub-title: As Long As We Both Shall Laugh
programme.desc: Russian comedian Yakov Smirnoff examines the differences between men and women in this one-man show.

programme.title: Yakov Smirnoff
programme.desc: Experience some of the funniest moments from Yakov's “Branson Today” talk show.

programme.title: Jim Gaffigan
programme.desc: Comedian Jim Gaffigan performs live at the State Theatre in Minneapolis, MN.

programme.title: Jim Gaffigan
programme.desc: In his 6th special, Jim uses humor to deal with the unthinkable & proves that laughter is the best medicine…or is it?

programme.title: Jeff Dunham: Spark of Insanity
programme.desc: Jeff Dunham and his socially reckless "suitcase posse" are back in this highly anticipated follow-up to Jeff Dunham: Arguing with Myself.

programme.title: RiffTrax

programme.title: RiffTrax

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: The curious six-year-old Buster is a friendly and eager-to-learn yellow bus who takes on new adventures.

programme.title: The King's Tournament
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights – the Tighty Knighties – are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks “How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero.” But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament – she's agreed to be in “princess mode” for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: Rabbitouille
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! Stephanie concocts a fabulous cake, and Sneaky Tanya steals the recipe -- but neither knows that pet bunny Daisy has added a secret key ingredient. Will Stephanie's frantic efforts to win at all costs end her friendship with her BFF's? It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! After the duo's rivalry brings Aunt Sophie's Adopt-A-Pet Fair to a disastrous end, a contrite Stephanie wants to make amends with the prize money from a TV Bake-Off show. At home, Stephanie practices baking a delicious cake, and Tanya steals the recipe. But neither girl knows that Stephanie's pet bunny has inadvertently added a secret ingredient, ensuring that no one can repeat the recipe. A frustrated Stephanie freaks out, nearly ending her friendship with the girls – until they discover the bunny's secret and race to help Stephanie win.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapo. Realizing how to correctly wield the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates evil replicas of the Ninja to face off with our heroes. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are invited back the Darkly's Boarding School, only to discover it's a trap and now the bad kids have seized control of the school. With the Ninja trapped in the school with the faculty, things spiral out of control as the Evil Replica Ninja arrive. As an awesome battle takes place in the school halls, the Ninja manage to outsmart their evil versions, and warn Lord Garmadon they're ready for whatever else he throws at them.

programme.title: Monster Chef
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his “Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition” cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. “Hot chili makes hot monsters!” Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands – meaning Jestro's – could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. “Nope, not hot enough…waaaay too much garlic….you call that hot?!” (BELCH!)

programme.title: Change Of Address
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong – especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing (“Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?”), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests then…more training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort “Exalted Towers” renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the “high class” resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are “off” at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to see…Jestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters – though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends – until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends – until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to ‘turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster. Tired of intense training, Lloyd yearns to play and enjoy his youth. The Ninja remind Lloyd that along with great power, comes great responsibility. When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to ‘turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and soon discover they've been turned into kids! Seeking Lloyd's help and relying on childhood antics, the five ninja kids must destroy the reawakened monster that's hunting them in the city. In the end, Lloyd makes the difficult decision and sacrifices his youth in order to save them from the beast, turning forward the clock and turning Lloyd into a young man. Sensei Wu fears now that since Lloyd is young man, the final battle of good versus evil approaches sooner than he had ever expected.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of “snotty” monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham – one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a “snotheiser” ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters … some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bath…he'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or two…it's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power “Glorious Griffon” but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: I Told You So
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her – till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit…

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton – the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hear…laughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, “my monster is so fat” jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as “bouncers” to keep too many people out of the comedy club. (“Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.”) The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. And…Jestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be bad…he is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages him…go on stage alone, be funny…he can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a “joke book” that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny – by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: “Where's my Jestro?!” Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest with…the Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Stone Army
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers. Lord Garmadon struggles controlling the Serpentine now that he is without the Mega-Weapon. His latest endeavor is to lead the snakes in search of a fabled Dark Island that ancient texts say holds dark powers. Unable to find the island, the furious Serpentine abandon Lord Garmadon out at sea. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are called to the museum to find the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has seeped into the ground beneath the city, and it's brought an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior to life! Our heroes come across Misako, Lloyd's long lost mother. She's an archeologist in search of stopping the prophesized battle between Lloyd and his father. She had unearthed the Stone Warrior, and shares how it was once part of an indestructible army created by a dark spirit named The Overlord. When the balance is altered and evil is let into Ninjago, it will allow the Overlord to return and bring darkness and destruction to the land. Unable to destroy the Terminator-like Stone Warrior, the Ninja cleverly trap it. In the end, Lord Garmadon awakens on a small island at sea and hears the voice of the banished Overlord, promising him his wildest dreams. Garmadon uses his four hands to activate a mechanism, raising a lost land from out of the sea, creating a Yin/Yang symbol with Ninjago. The ultimate battle between good and evil begins to unfold.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal to…Clay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some ‘Master Plan.” Suddenly, they realize Monsters – led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster – are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lance…finally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the books…and now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayal…the Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towards…the Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Midwinter Night's Dream
programme.desc: When Emma accidentally causes Olivia to lose an important science prize, a furious Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends. But after a New Year's Eve dream, in which a living, breathing Zobo takes her on a tour of her past, present and potential future, Olivia is reminded that friendship is the most valuable prize of all. Today is the most important day of Olivia's life. Not because tonight is New Year's Eve, but it's also the day of the annual Robotics Challenge, when teen scientists compete to build the best robot and win a full university scholarship. Olivia has spent the whole year preparing her entry: an all-new, high-tech, flying Aviator Zobo. It's a sure winner – until Emma accidentally sabotages it and wins the trophy herself! Furious, Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends (for defending Emma), and stomps out in tears. That night, in a dream, a living, breathing Aviator Zobo takes her on a tour of her life – past, present and potential future – to remind her that friendship is the most valuable prize of all.

programme.title: Aurora: Fire In The Sky
programme.desc: In the earth's polar regions, a ghostly flicker and colourful glow often brightens the night sky. Whoever sees an aurora event will never forget this impressive experience. Finland's Saami people, Alaska's Inuit, Canada's Native Americans and New Zealand's Maori all have legends about the origins and meaning of this magic natural spectacle. These stories tell of spirits dancing in the sky, of a bright and better world where hunting game is abundant, of battling gods and celestial messages. This programme links such popular legends to the aurora's physical effects on the natural world. It covers aurora research and the most recent scientific discoveries. Breathtaking time-lapse recordings of aurora events, lavish computer animations of the ‘space weather' as well as scenes from the lives of indigenous peoples add up to a comprehensive portrait of the aurora, and shine a light on its influence on humans and the natural world.

programme.desc: In the tradition of "The African Queen", ornery adversaries whose differences begin to crumble amidst the breathtaking beauty of the African wilderness. Stars Elizabeth Montgomery and Robert Foxworth.

programme.title: Red 2

programme.title: Becoming Ms. Bennet: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: A popular American vlogger is cast in a British film production of "Pride and Prejudice," but she struggles with her accent and a co-star who believes she isn't up to the role.

programme.title: Law of Attraction
programme.desc: When a young attorney meets a nice guy at a destination wedding, she starts to have feelings until she learns he's the opposing attorney on her case. Will love prevail?

programme.title: Comeback Season
programme.desc: Married suburbanite father Walter Pearce (Ray Liotta) admits to a marital indiscretion and is thrown out of the house by his wife, Deborah (Glenne Headly). Meanwhile, recently injured high school quarterback Skylar (Shaun Sipos) is arrested for drinking -- and finds Walter, who was arrested for fighting, in the same cell. When Walter's daughter, Christine (Brooke Nevin), suggests that Walter move in with Skylar, the unlikely pair set out to make amends for their past misdeeds.

programme.title: Endless Summer
programme.desc: Keith has spent his whole life dreaming about Alicia. On his last day in town he tries to be noticed by her.

programme.title: Stuck in Love
programme.desc: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love over the course of a year. Starring Jennifer Connelly, Kristen Bell, Greg Kinnear.

programme.title: JK's House
programme.desc: At JK's House, Dr. Amber Jenkins (Robin Givens) and JK (Jakayla Lawrence) blend family values and life lessons with music and dance.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman with a heart condition who begins to suspect that her new husband might.

programme.title: Citizen Jane
programme.desc: Activist Jane Alexander (Ally Sheedy) launches a crusade for justice against a former boyfriend (Sean Patrick Flanery) who murdered her beloved aunt.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: Enders Game
programme.desc: Harrison Ford, Asa Butterfield, Hailee Steinfeld, Ben Kingsley, Viola Davis, and Abigail Breslin lead this action-packed sci-fi adventure based on the best-selling novel.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons.

programme.title: Streets of Blood
programme.desc: While investigating the "accidental" death of his partner, a New Orleans police officer plunges into the city's criminal underworld. Starring Val Kilmer ("The Doors") and 50 Cent.
