programme.desc: While investigating the "accidental" death of his partner, a New Orleans police officer plunges into the city's criminal underworld. Starring Val Kilmer ("The Doors") and 50 Cent.

programme.title: Shade
programme.desc: Hoping to take down a legendary card sharp, a trio of grifters tries to bankroll their scheme by conning a mob bagman, but his Mafia pals come looking for payback.

programme.title: Seed: The Untold Story
programme.desc: In the last century, 94% of our seed varieties have disappeared. As biotech chemical companies control the majority of our seed, farmers and indigenous keepers fight a David and Goliath battle to defend the future of our food.

programme.title: Can You Dig This
programme.desc: In South Central Los Angeles, four inspiring gardeners join a movement to revolutionize one of the largest food deserts in the country, discovering what happens when they put their hands in the soil. Produced by singer John Legend, this is a story of the perseverance of the human spirit.

programme.title: The Delicacy
programme.desc: The Delicacy is the story of a rare and exotic food, the sea urchin.

programme.title: Unbranded
programme.desc: Unbranded follows four men and sixteen mustangs on an epic 3,000-mile journey from Mexico to Canada through the American West to inspire adoptions for the 50,000 wild horses and burros in government captivity.

programme.title: The BAM: The Willie Johnson Story
programme.desc: The gripping story of how martial arts transformed a criminal into a 7-time World Champion, a community leader and a real man. Willie Johnson tells his story through his own words, from the highs to the lows, and how he has triumphed over it all.

programme.title: Out of Gas
programme.desc: Two married couples set out to go on a trip to a marriage retreat to enhance their marriage, but is faced with dark evil along the way. As darkness falls upon them, secrets are revealed. Trust is no longer among them and what was supposed to be a moment of beautiful memories becomes a nightmare.

programme.title: The City of Crosses
programme.desc: Two best friends come upon a murder that will derail their lives forever. They keep the secret to themselves only to share it with the girl in their circle, Samantha. As life would have it, anything hidden won't stay buried forever.

programme.title: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Stacy is a freshman at a Historic Black College & University. She Meets and falls in love with a Grad Student named Benjamin. He's nice and charming at first. Until he starts to control her and physically, psychologically, and verbally abuse her. Can Stacy get out of this domestic violence relationship before it's too late?

programme.title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ruby (Jamie Chung) and Josh (Bryan Greenberg) spent an unforgettable night together in Hong Kong a year ago, and now their brief encounter is about to get a second chance.

programme.title: Seeking Dolly Parton
programme.desc: When Charlie and her girlfriend Cerina decide to have a baby together, the idea of using Cerina's ex-boyfriend Josh as the live-in donor turns an easy on-paper idea into a much more challenging event.

programme.title: Amy and Peter Are Getting Divorced
programme.desc: A seemingly perfect couple are considering a divorce. Their friends are stunned and put everything in place to prevent the breakup of the model couple

programme.title: The Divorce Party
programme.desc: A newly dumped divorcee (Thomas Cocquerel) hires his former wedding planner (Matilda Lutz) to throw a 'divorce party' celebrating his newfound singledom after being left by his wife (Claire Holt).

programme.title: 10e
programme.desc: After a 17-year old girl's reputation takes a hit at school before the prom, her single father tries to rebuild their relationship by acting as more of a friend, when what she really needs is a father.

programme.title: Our Wife
programme.desc: A self-pitying, drunken composer finds inspiration in a new woman only to have his ex-wife decide that she now wants him back.

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: An outlandish, sidesplitting tale of the fortunes of the Duchy of Grand Fenwick.

programme.title: Too Many Husbands
programme.desc: An excellent romantic comedy starring Jean Arthur, who is married to Melvyn Douglas. When her first husband (Fred MacMurray), thought dead, shows up, he turns her world upside down. Comic tensions flare when both husbands vie for Arthur's affections. The two men finally become fed up with Arthur's love for attention--they leave and become friends.

programme.title: The Wrecking Crew
programme.desc: Matt Helm, ICE's greatest secret agent, must retrieve one billion dollars in stolen gold before the world's economy collapses.

programme.title: Violets Are Blue
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts reunited after many years, fall in love again.

programme.title: The Facts of Life Goes To Paris
programme.desc: Based on the NBC comedy series THE FACTS OF LIFE. The school nutritionist and her girls spend their summer vacation in Paris. The trip turns out to be more than they bargained for.

programme.title: The Facts of Life Goes Down Under
programme.desc: The gang from THE FACTS OF LIFE head to Australia to help their sister school celebrate its centennial. The escapade involves them in a jewel theft which leads to romance and adventure.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: A young American couple inherits an English castle, only to find that the spirit of a disgraced ancestor haunts it.

programme.title: The Nevadan
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger crosses paths with an outlaw bank robber and a greedy rancher.

programme.title: Hoedown
programme.desc: Jock Mahoney is a movie cowboy fired by his studio. Along with Vera Wright (Jeff Donnell), a reporter, he accidentally discovers that the latest residents of Eddy Arnold's "singing dude ranch" are really bank robbers.

programme.title: The Texas Rangers
programme.desc: Carver, the fastest gun in the West, leads his men in pursuit of the notorious Sam Bass gang.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: A powerful rancher always protects his wild adult son with hush money, until the son's crimes cross the line.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs, and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: Gary Cooper won the Oscar for the Best Actor in this classic tale of a lawman who stands alone to defend a town of cowardly citizens against a gang of revenge-seeking criminals.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Lone Ranger and Tonto arrive in Cottonwood in time to see a law reformer gunned down by an outlaw.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: An English couple comes to Ponderosa on vacation, but the wife slowly makes it clear that she is disappointed.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: While in San Francisco, two of Ben's hired hands get kidnapped and so does Ben in the process of looking for them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is drawn to a young widow passing through town on her way to claim an inheritance but others who covet it are trying to kill her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a horse dealer transporting a prize stallion stops in North Fork, two saddle tramps try to use trickery to obtain it.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: Confederate veteran John Chandler (Alan Ladd) returns from defeat in war to find his home razed, his wife dead and his young son, David (David Ladd), traumatized and rendered mute. Desperate to cure the boy, Chandler takes David to a small town in Illinois where he hopes to find a doctor. But, soon after the pair arrives, Chandler finds himself framed for assault -- and forced to choose between serving hard time and working for struggling local farmer Linnett Moore (Olivia de Havilland).

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A neighboring rancher is good friends with Ben, but his son wants to sell their land for mining operations.
